    • shootKnockback

      public void shootKnockback(GxPatrolBotArm arm, float knockbackAmount)
      Called when the bot shoots a projectile, applies knockback to the bot as a recoil effect.
      Parameters:
      arm - The arm weapon that shot the projectile.
      knockbackAmount - The amount of knockback to apply, which is distributed per the rotation of the arm.
